nodes.text: Hrakert Station was a secret Republic Kolto harvesting base on the planet Manaan during the time of the Jedi Civil War. It was constructed at the Hrakert Rift by the Republic and several far-sighted Selkath, who realized that Manaan and the Selkath would suffer greatly under the yoke of the Sith.

In 3956 BBY, the Republic Embassy on Manaan lost contact with the station and sent several mercenaries to investigate the situation. When none returned, Roland Wann enlisted the services of Revan to do the same, promising that this would in turn lead Revan to the Star Map that he sought. Revan discovered that almost everyone on the station had been killed and eaten by maddened Selkath who had been driven insane by the calls of the Progenitor. In order to pacify the Progenitor, who was distressed by the construction encroaching upon her lair, Revan destroyed the Hrakert kolto harvester. Once the Progenitor had been placated, she allowed Revan access to the Star Map near the base.
The station later became the secret headquarters of the Order of Shasa, a Force-sensitive Selkath cult.

If the player chooses to follow the dark side story, Revan releases a chemical that kills the Progenitor but turns the kolto black. For killing the Progenitor, Revan is banned from visiting Manaan again on pain of death.
Either Calo Nord or Darth Bandon may appear in Hrakert Station, depending on the order in which the player visits the planets.
